nodes.text: Star Wars: Clone Troopers in Action

Star Wars: Clone Troopers in Action is a Star Wars Legends Level 2 DK Readers title focusing on the clone troopers of the Galactic Republic. It was written by Clare Hibbert and was published by DK Publishing on October 18, 2010.
The book has been reissued twice under the Disney brand with new cover art, once in 2016 and again as part of the Learn to Read with Star Wars: R2-D2 Level 2 box set on December 12, 2017.

DK Readers team up with Star Wars and Star Wars: The Clone Wars yet again to get Padawans excited to read! Perfect for reluctant readers as well as devoted Star Wars and Star Wars: The Clone Wars fans, DK's Star Wars Readers have sold over 2.5 million units!

From their creation on Kamino as clones of Jengo Fett to their first battles against the separatists, Clone Troopers in Action tells the story of the Clone Troopers as seen in Star Wars: Attack of the Clones.
